desc: Split Design (based in Coffs Harbour NSW) specialises in handcrafted unique furniture, cabinets and vanities using beautiful natural timber & epoxy resin. Our stunning range of handcrafted designs include tables, desks, bathroom vanities, mirror cabinets, bedside tables, dressers, TV cabinets and decor items.

layout.text: We make quality handcrafted timber and resin products, available direct to the public. We specialise in crafting custom vanities, cabinets and furniture to order, and love incorporating feature grade timbers and live edges in our designs. We also hand make a range of decor items and jewellery.
